headline: The Hartford Appoints Thomas Bartlett To Its Board Of Directors
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., June 10, 2025--The Hartford has appointed Thomas Bartlett to the company’s board of directors, effective July 1, 2025. He will serve on the board’s Finance, Investment and Risk Management Committee as well as the Audit Committee.
